::Prowl::

He manuvered out of the way.
"He killed himself in that explosion. But if you want to die, just bring
it."
He fired two missiles at Megatron. He then opened a link.
"Maximals, concentrate on Megatron, he must be destroyed!"

OOC: HAPPY HOLLOWEEN!!!!!!
